metadata.title: CVE-2024-36015 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ppdev: Add an error check in register_deviceIn register_device, the return value of ida_simple_get is unchecked,in witch ida_simple_get will use an invalid index value.To address this issue, index should be checked after ida_simple_get. Whenthe index value is abnormal, a warning message should be printed, the portshould be dropped, and the value should be recorded.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-36015` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-generic - 4.4.0-2.16
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-211-lowlatency - 4.4.0-2.16
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1094-kvm - 4.4.0-1004.9
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1129-aws - 4.4.0-1001.10
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
